sentences.english: The effect of the anomalous magnetic moment of the nucleon on the value of the internal conversion coefficient is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論核子的反常磁矩對於內轉換系數數值的影響。

sentences.english: We have estimated the effect of EPI on the existence and size of the local magnetic moment.
sentences.chinese: 主要討論了EPI對局域磁矩的存在和大小的影響。

sentences.english: The anomalous nucleon moments are due to hadronic effects .
sentences.chinese: 反常核子磁矩是由強子效應引起的。

sentences.english: Two oxygen atoms have similar size of magnetic moment but the opposite direction.
sentences.chinese: 兩個氧原子的磁矩大小接近但方向相反。

sentences.english: A strong magnet was critical to trapping antihydrogen atoms by using their small magnetic moments.
sentences.chinese: 採用具有微弱磁矩的強磁體是捕獲反氫原子的關鍵。

sentences.english: In a paramagnetic material the directions of the magnetic moments vary randomly from atom to atom.
sentences.chinese: 在順磁材料中，磁矩的方向在原子之間隨意變化。

sentences.english: The magnetic moment of Tm ions is very similar to the experimental results.
sentences.chinese: 磁性銩離子磁矩的計算結果與實驗值符合得較好。

sentences.english: The magnetic moments of the two oxygen atoms have a similar magnitude but acting in opposite direction.
sentences.chinese: 兩個氧原子的磁矩大小接近但方向相反。

sentences.english: The abnormal mass and the magnetic moment of three generation leptons have been calculated.
sentences.chinese: 據此計算了三代輕子的“反常質量”與“反常磁矩”。

sentences.english: Taking the proton moments as an example, we discuss the calculation of baryon moments in this work.
sentences.chinese: 並以質子磁矩爲例，討論了重子磁矩的計算。

sentences.english: Taking the proton moments as an example, we discuss the calculation of baryon moments in this work.
sentences.chinese: 並以質子磁矩爲例，討論了重子磁矩的計算。

definition: crystal lattice (the regular 3-dimensional pattern formed by atoms in a crystal)
